original_title: US appreciates Sri Lanka’s role in Red Sea operations
original_body_lines: US Deputy Secretary of State Richard Verma appreciates Sri Lanka's involvement in the ongoing security operations in the Red Sea, and announces that a 4th Coast Guard Cutter will be gifted to the Sri Lankan Navy to further expand its naval operation capabilities.
President Ranil Wickremesinghe re-iterated the country's commitment to the Freedom of Navigation in the Indian Ocean.
